meanings.sent1: After the rain, the ground felt clammiest under my feet.
meanings.sent2: The clammiest towel in the bathroom was left hanging to dry.
meanings.sent3: The clammiest handshake I ever received was from a nervous student.
meanings.sent4: Her clammiest fear was that she would forget her lines on stage.
meanings.sent5: The clammiest feeling of all was when the wet dog jumped on the couch.

meanings.sent1: The clammiest weather made it hard to enjoy the outdoor picnic.
meanings.sent2: She avoided touching the clammiest parts of the old book.
meanings.sent3: The clammiest hug from her little brother left her shirt wet.
meanings.sent4: The clammiest situation was trying to fix the leaky faucet in the dark.
meanings.sent5: His clammiest memory was getting caught in the sudden downpour without an umbrella.
